Plot: A homicidal car tire, discovering it has destructive psionic power, sets its sights on a desert town once a mysterious woman becomes its obsession.
Title: Rubber
Actors: Stephen Spinella, Jack Plotnick, Wings Hauser, Roxane Mesquida
tomatoConsensus: A clever premise gets plenty of comic blood and violence, but its hampered by some questionable storytelling techniques from director Quentin Dupieux.
